import React from "react"; const DetailAbsen = () => { const handleTampilkan = async () => { if (!bulan || !tahun) { alert("Pilih bulan dan tahun terlebih dahulu."); return; } const from = `${tahun}-${bulan}-01`; const to = moment(from).endOf("month").format("YYYY-MM-DD"); try { setLoading(true); const response = await axios.post( "http://localhost:3001/summary?from=" + from + "&to=" + to, { employee_nik } ); setDataAbsen(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error("Gagal fetch summary:", error); alert("Gagal menampilkan data absen."); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; return (
